name: ParadiseLost AlchemistTerra
description:
The 3rd title of ParadiseLost game series.
"Terra's Summons"

PROLOGUE

There's a girl named Terra.
She had been displeased for a long time.
Because the earth which God created
was too boring.

Accordingly,
she started the Creation
of the new world.

---------------------------------------
"Terra's Summons" was updated!
The Secret Level is added.
Complete all items, and the mystery of this world will be clared up!?
